amendment.description: Amendment classifies a vessel being repaired or dismantled to be a "recreational vessel" if the vessel shares elements of design and construction of traditional recreational vessels and is not normally engaged in a military or commercial undertaking when operating.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 115-217 to classify a vessel being repaired or dismantled to be a "recreational vessel" if the vessel shares elements of design and construction of traditional recreational vessels and is not normally engaged in a military or commercial undertaking when operating.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 244 - 181 (Roll no. 374).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Byrne.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 244 - 181 (Roll no. 374).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
